name: ZipWeb
short_description: ZipWeb is a free service that allows you to browse the internet using an advanced st of tools depending on what type of ZipWeb package you download. We essentially enhance the web for a certain type of use whether that use is Developer, Busines, or Personal, we will give you tons of tools to make your site great. You can also sync any version of ZipWeb to Internet Explorer to get a more personallized web experience. ZipWeb gives you extra plugins and tools too. Best of all, everything in ZipWeb is 100 percent free. We don't believe in making you pay for good internet and so, not only do we give it to you for free, but we maximize your experience with it to make sure you enjoy every second of your time with us.
summary: ZipWeb is a free service that allows you to browse the internet!
